docs.abstract: Study by Drs Oscar Auerbach, E Cuyler Hammond and Lawrence Garfinkel shows precancerous cell changes in lungs of cigarette smokers is far less common in '70's than they were in '50's, rept in New Eng Journal of Med; implication is that natl trend toward use of filter cigarettes will reduce incidence of lung cancer (M)

headline.main: Less Peril Seen in Filter Cigarette

docs.lead_paragraph: WITH "The Magician," in which he plays the title role expected to be released in the next couple of months. "The InLaws," in which he plays a dentist, just completed, and "Simon," in which he plays a member of the Columbia University faculty, scheduled to start production next week, Alan Arkin is in something very like actor's heaven these days.
